meanings.sent1: The choosers picked their favorite ice cream flavors at the shop.

meanings.sent3: The choosers at the restaurant had a tough time deciding between pizza and pasta.
meanings.sent4: In the land of choosers, the options were endless and overwhelming.
meanings.sent5: The role of the choosers was crucial in selecting the best candidate for the job.

meanings.sent3: The group of choosers debated for hours on where to go for their next vacation.
